page.title: 11BUILTH (W): EDUC.(PRIMARY)
page.content: Builth (W) serves as the educational centre for the surrounding area stretching westwards as far as Llanwrtyd Wells,northwards to Newbridge on Wye and Hundred House and southwards as far as Erwood. The primary school is housed in a two storey stone building,which was erected in 1911. There are eight classes for the four to eleven age range,and there are about 230 pupils on roll.There are no playing fields, so the Groe has to be used for any team games.Dining facilities are shared with the high school.
